mapper.select: with recursive tmp as (select c1.* from contents c1 where c1.contents_id = #{contentsId} union all select c2.* from contents c2 inner join tmp on tmp.contents_id = c2.super_id) select * from tmp
with recursive tmp as (select c1.* from contents c1 where c1.contents_id = #{contentsId} union all select c2.* from contents c2, tmp c3 where c2.super_id = c3.contents_id) select c.* from tmp c
with recursive tmp as ( select c1.* from contents c1 where c1.super_id is null union all select c2.* from contents c2, tmp c3 where c2.super_id = c3.contents_id ) select c.* from tmp c
